name: Fantastic Poor Visual Novel DEMO for (Android)
name_original: Fantastic Poor Visual Novel DEMO for (Android)
description:
(This is the DEMO version. ^_^)

It is a wholesome story about a first-year student girl who lost her wallet. She encountered Fpoor students due to the situation. It has a slight of comedy and romance with meaningful life lessons from the Creator.

March 2nd is the First Release of this downloadable Visual Novel game for Mac & Linux

Specifications for the REAL Version (NOT the DEMO):

  • 25+ Chapters
  • 25,000+ words
  • English Language
  • 5 Different Routes
  • 100+ character sprites
  • 100+ unlockable images
  • Approx. 2 hrs reading time
  • Screen Resolution 1066 X 600
